message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $180. It's a great compromise between our initial offers. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $150. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand you're willing to go up to $150, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell it to you for that price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers, which would be $170. It's the best I can do. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, and I'm willing to pay $150. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
